description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler in C++ within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, specifying callback methods for various OCI container events, such as start, stop, failure, and state change.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class with pure virtual methods to handle different OCI container events.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container starts, with container name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container stops, with container name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container encounters a failure, with container name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container changes state, with container name and event data.
